name: Brian Cabello
title: Full-Stack Developer
summary: I'm an entry-level Full-Stack Developer and currently a student in the Information Technology Software Development program at NBCC. Passionate about building clean, maintainable, and functional software.
bio: I am an entry-level Full-Stack Developer and currently a student in the Information Technology Software Development program at New Brunswick Community College (NBCC) in Moncton. I am passionate about building clean, maintainable, and functional software using modern frameworks and best practices.

My goal is to contribute effectively to development teams and continuously grow as a professional developer. I bring experience from diverse roles including team leadership, technical support, and operational management, which have strengthened my discipline, communication, and problem-solving skills.
